title: Role Management Implementation
goal: Implement a complete role-based access control system including data models, logic, and UI integration.

track.name: Role Management
track.goal: Enable role-based authorization and management within the accounting application.

tasks.title: Define Role and User Entities
tasks.intent: Implement the data structures for roles and users in the security module.

definition_of_done.cmd: maestro convert run "Security and Identity/01_Data_Layer/Define Role and User Entities.md"

tasks.title: Implement Role Persistence
tasks.intent: Implement logic for saving and loading role data to persistent storage.

definition_of_done.cmd: maestro convert run "Security and Identity/01_Data_Layer/Implement Role Persistence.md"

tasks.title: Implement Role-Based Authorization Logic
tasks.intent: Implement core authorization checks based on defined roles and permissions.

definition_of_done.cmd: maestro convert run "Security and Identity/02_Authentication_Core/Implement Role-Based Authorization Logic.md"

tasks.title: Create Role Selection UI
tasks.intent: Develop the user interface for selecting and managing roles.

definition_of_done.cmd: maestro convert run "Security and Identity/03_UI_Integration/Create Role Selection UI.md"

tasks.title: Integrate Role Access into Main GUI
tasks.intent: Connect role management tools to the main application interface.

definition_of_done.cmd: maestro convert run "Security and Identity/03_UI_Integration/Integrate Role Access into Main GUI.md"

tasks.title: Build and Verify
tasks.intent: Verify the entire role management system by compiling the application.
